name: Klaustrophobia
description:
Klaustrophobia is a horror game where you must survive against Klauwn.

This is my attempt to learn Unity and also kickstart my YouTube channel called Kandles, this game was made for fun and educational purposes and is not meant to be taken seriously. I am already aware this game is not very fun however if you do want to get a little kick out of playing a jank horror game, this is the game for you!

If you want to check out the process of creating this game, consider checking out my channel.

The name is inspired by my pet cat called Klaus due to me not being very creative with original names.
